price: 49. Nabiyow ama anbiyak maqaanék koh cusnem kassiisi, diggah Yallak meesita mari meqe gacsimeyna-le akceral.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
